alert.note: Alert for Macon; Schley; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 8:04PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Macon, northeastern Schley and south central Taylor Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 804 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Whitewater State Park, or near Oglethorpe, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Oglethorpe, Montezuma, Ideal, Whitewater State Park, Clearview, Fountainville, Garden Valley, Winchester, Bartlett, Hicks and Potterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
